Commission: 1.5% FLAT FEE
Public Remarks: Last night I dreamt of the perfect condo, it was located in a quiet residential area and the layout feels like the main floor of a house. Everything I needed was within walking distance of my front door and traveling to my favourite spots like Stanley Park & Lower Lonsdale, only took a few minutes! The dream continued... I prepared for work the next day, enjoying a cup of coffee and looked out from my desk, on to nature, but my thoughts were not about work.. I was planning dinner for the friends that were coming over that evening, because I love to entertain! The only troubling part of my dream was that I couldn't figure out if we should dine al fresco or stay inside, close to the wine bar. What would you do?
Realtor Remarks: Floor area taken from BC Assessment. Team Disclosure to accompany all offers. Showings by appointment.

You enter this home from the lobby level of the building (no elevator required!) but once in the suite you are elevated from the ground, providing safety and tranquility, with no immediate neighbours and a private view of Thomas Creek. The kitchen flows unopposed into the bright, south facing dining and living room, which in turn flows out to your BBQ friendly patio, where you can stand with crisp glass of chardonnay and pretend you're the main contributor to every meal! The laundry room has been nicely updated with a perfect folding spot as well! The building also boasts a guest suite and gym.
